info.description: Seismic programs connector provides a set of actions and triggers to interact with programs, tasks and requests.
info.title: Seismic Programs

parameters.description: List of user IDs to query by creator
parameters.name: creatorIds

get.description: Get all comments for a given program, task, or request. Requires node (program, task, or request) ID.

post.description: Create a comment on a given program, task, or request. Requires node (program, task, or request) ID.

get.description: Get a single comment. Requires node (program, task, or request) and comment ID.

delete.description: Delete a comment. Requires node (program, task, or request) and comment ID.

put.description: Update an existing comment. Requires node (program, task, or request) and comment ID.

parameters.description: Filter from a planned end date
parameters.name: plannedEndDateFrom

parameters.description: Filter to a planned end date
parameters.name: plannedEndDateTo

parameters.description: Filter from a planned start date
parameters.name: plannedStartDateFrom

parameters.description: Filter to a planned start date
parameters.name: plannedStartDateTo

parameters.description: List of Program IDs to query by
parameters.name: ids

parameters.description: List of user IDs to query by manager
parameters.name: managerIds

parameters.description: List of user IDs to query by creator
parameters.name: creatorIds

parameters.description: List of association IDs to query by
parameters.name: associatedNodeIds

parameters.description: List of custom properties to query by
parameters.name: customProperties

parameters.description: List of user IDs to query by follower
parameters.name: followerIds

parameters.description: List of archived or non-archived programs
parameters.name: archived

parameters.description: List of program audience user IDs to query by
parameters.name: audience

parameters.description: First Outcome KPI Metric enum to query by
parameters.name: outcomeKpiFirst

parameters.description: Second Outcome KPI Metric enum to query by
parameters.name: outcomeKpiSecond

parameters.description: Third Outcome KPI Metric enum to query by
parameters.name: outcomeKpiThird

parameters.description: A list of current phase IDs to query by
parameters.name: currentPhases

parameters.description: Indicator to allow for inclusion of association data
parameters.name: includeAssociations

parameters.description:
Indicator to allow for inclusion of archived programs (ignored when enabled
is passed)
parameters.name: includeDeactivatedPrograms

parameters.description: Indicator to allow for inclusion of pages data
parameters.name: includePages

get.description: Get a list of programs with their attributes and associations.

parameters.description: Number to indicate depth of associated node data returned
parameters.name: associatedNodesDepth

parameters.description: Indicator to include associated tasks data
parameters.name: includeWorks

get.description: Get a single program by ID. Return tasks if desired.

parameters.description: Keyword values to search for on request titles
parameters.name: title

parameters.description: A list of assignees' user IDs to filter by
parameters.name: assigneeIds

parameters.description: A list of priority values, Available values : critical, high, medium, low
parameters.name: priorities

parameters.description: A list of assigner' user Ids to filter by
parameters.name: assignerIds

parameters.description: A list of creators' user IDs to filter by
parameters.name: creatorIds

parameters.description: A list of step IDs to filter by
parameters.name: stepIds

parameters.description: Status schema ID to filter by
parameters.name: statusSchemaId

parameters.description: A token used to guide the next page window
parameters.name: cursor

parameters.description: Number of items to return per page, default: 50
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: The Program ID a request is associated to
parameters.name: programId

parameters.description: Filter by if requests are associated with a program
parameters.name: hasProgram

parameters.description: A list of followers' user id
parameters.name: followerIds

parameters.description: A list of Associated node IDs to filter by
parameters.name: associatedNodeIds

parameters.description: whether to include request form custom properties, default false
parameters.name: includeRequestFormCustomProperties

parameters.description: List of request IDs for deletion
parameters.name: body

parameters.description: List of user IDs to query by creator
parameters.name: creatorIds

get.description:
Get a list of task/request status schemas. These schemas hold the data for set statuses for specific work.

Example: `(Not started, In progress, Complete)`

Get a single status schema by ID. These schemas hold the data for set statuses for specific work.

Example: `(Not started, In progress, Complete)`

parameters.description: Filter by a list of task IDs
parameters.name: ids

parameters.description: List of user IDs to filter by assignee
parameters.name: assigneeIds

parameters.description: List of user IDs to filter by user that assigned the task
parameters.name: assignerIds

parameters.description: Include subtasks within the returned list
parameters.name: recursive

parameters.description: Filter by tasks that are associated with a program
parameters.name: hasProgram

parameters.description: List of user IDs to filter by followers
parameters.name: followerIds

parameters.description: List of association IDs to filter by
parameters.name: associatedNodeIds

parameters.description: List of user IDs to filter by creator
parameters.name: creatorIds

parameters.description: Include association data in the response
parameters.name: includeAssociations

parameters.description: List of task IDs to filter by
parameters.name: parentId

get.description: Get a single task by ID.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Program data after the creation of the program

id.description: A unique identifier for the event.

version.description: The version of the event, e.g., "ProgramCreateV1".

occurredAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the event occurred in UTC.

application.description: The application where the event originated.

productArea.description: The product area related to the event.

post.description: Trigger to respond to when a program is created

filter.description: Example: $.data..[?(@.id == 'foo')] , JsonPath based filter expression, refer https://developer.seismic.com/seismicsoftware/docs/webhooksoverview#filtering-events for details.
filter.title: filter

id.description: ID of audience (user group, user, etc.)
Unique identifier for the created webhook subscription.

callbackUrl.description: Confirmed URL to which events will be sent.

eventTypes.description: Event type for which the webhook was created.

id.description: Comment ID

isResolved.description: True/false on whether the comment is resolved

items.description: List of items in the response

docCenterFullPath.description: Full location path of where content exists in DocCenter

modifiedDate.description: Date the content reference was last updated

isResolved.description: True/false on whether the comment is resolved

contentRefs.description: List of content references (DocCenter and Workspace associations)

programId.description: ID of program the request belongs to
ID of program the task is associated with

allowMultipleValues.description: Indicates if custom property allows for multiple values

hasDomainOfValues.description: Indicates if custom property has possible values

hint.description: Value that describes the hint displayed under the custom property name

isRequired.description: Indicates whether the custom property is required or not

lastModifiedById.description: User ID of the user that last updated the custom property

operationSetting.description: Object that describes settings for different operations on a custom property

order.description: Number indicating order within custom property list

possibleValues.description: List of possible values for the custom property (if applicable)

scopeSettings.description: Object that describes settings for different scopes on a custom property

valueSchemaName.description: Name of custom property value schema

multipleValue.description: Indicate if the custom property allows multiple values

value.description: Value data for custom property value

ids.description: List of Request IDs to delete

id.description: User/User group ID of follower

type.description: Either user or user group follower type

targetValue.description: User specified number target value for objective

measuredIn.description: Option to set how metric is measured

trend.description: Option to set how the objective trend is being tracked

dateRange.description: Date range set for the trend

isHideFromOverView.description: Option to hide metric objective from overview page

associatedToField.description: The field the phase is associated with that comes from PhaseType

description.description: Description of phase that comes from PhaseType

color.description: Color of phase that comes from PhaseType

ordinality.description: Order of phase that comes from PhaseType

actualEndDate.description: Calculated end date from when the program actually ended

actualStartDate.description: Calculated start date from when the program actually started

copyFrom.description: Program ID the program is copied from

isActive.description: Indicator on if a program is active or not

isTemplate.description: Indicator on if the program is a template or not

plannedEndDate.description: Date string of planned end date

plannedStartDate.description: Date string of planned start date

templateId.description: Template ID the the program was created from

archived.description: Indicator on if a program is archived or not

hideTips.description: Indicator if the user has hidden tips or not

audience.description: List of user groups for program audience

items.description: List of program items in the response
